input.sentences: there is a beautiful old light house on the edge of the cliff .
the light house is built on a very rocky cliff .
the view from the lighthouse is rocks and the ocean .
there is a white house built alongside the light house .
the light house can be reached by driving up the main road on town .
output.sentences: There is a small town with a lighthouse
The lighthouse sits on top of a beautiful hill
You can see the water from the window of the light house
The owners live in a beautiful little house with a white picket fence
Everyone in town loves the lighthouse
